findings.title: Unprotected Approve Function
findings.description: The approve function does not have proper access control, allowing unauthorized users to approve tokens.

findings.title: Transfer Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The transfer function allows executing transfers of a specified number of tokens to a specified address.

findings.title: Unprotected Permit Function
findings.description: The permit function is marked as external and has no access control, allowing anyone to call it.

findings.title: Unprotected mint Function
findings.description: The mint function is marked as External and has a warning symbol, indicating it may be unprotected or unsecured.

findings.title: burn
findings.description: The burn function may contain a vulnerability.

findings.title: swap
findings.description: Potential issue with swap functions supporting fee-on-transfer tokens

findings.title: Skim
findings.description: Potential reentrancy vulnerability in skim function.

findings.title: Unprotected Initialize Function
findings.description: The initialize function is unprotected and can be called multiple times, potentially leading to unintended behavior.
